name: Schmeat vs. Greens
description:
⚠  EARLY ACCESS  ⚠ Schmeat vs. Greens

Schmeat vs. Greens,  it's a tower defense,  the name being a play on Plants vs Zombies.  Every time you expand the map a new wave will spawn, and you will have to use your towers to stop the Greens from getting to the Schmeat Burger.  At the end of each wave, you will be given 3 card options to select from (which currently have the most informative descriptions, that will definitely give you enough info to know how the tower works.).  When you select a card it will go into the deck in the bottom left of the screen.  You can move towers around after initial placement (it's a bit wacky in v0.50.2) so it doesn't really matter where they are placed to start.  

Things that are in the game.
  • Tower Cards to select from each wave.
  • Unbalanced Towers.
  • Unbalanced Enemies.
  • Map Expansions.
  • Losing the Game Screen.
  • Winning the Game Screen.
Things that are missing from the game.
  • Menu Screen
  • Permanent Progression (being able to unlock more towers in a menu screen)
  • Upgradable tower damages.
  • Boss waves
  • Saving of a nonexistent currency for the permanency upgrades
  • a lot of visual stuff (animations, particle effects, background details, etc.)

if you buy the game during this early access time, you can expect an update within the next week.

Hopefully, you enjoy it.
